channel.title: [317] help with npc attacks
channel.description: i followed a tut on this and changed the max hit of bronze dragon so it hits zero but i still have one problem. it breathes fire which damages. can you tell me either how to make the fire hit o aswell or make it so it dont damage or get rid of the fire? :cool:

item.title: [317] help with npc attacks
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

You want your bronze dragons to all hit 0? If that is the case, and the fire breathing part of it is still hitting damage. You could build a separate method that any damage taken from that sort of attack will be converted to 0. If you need help with doing so, can I see the guide that you followed first?

Read full topic
